short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An auto clicker triggered by a hotkey with configurable CPS and element selector.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Clicker 🚀

Tired of auto clickers that just don't work? 😤 We've got you covered! As the developers behind the online CPS (Clicks Per Second) test and seasoned extension creators, we've cracked the code. Other auto clickers let you precisely target the element on the page—that's where ours stands out! 🎯

Simply set your desired CPS and select your target element right from the popup, then start clicking away instantly! 🖱️💨

We've tested it on the CPS test website:

https://www.arealme.com/click-speed-test/en/

Just enter #clickarena in the popup's Element Selector, and let the auto-clicking fun begin! 😎

Got questions? Feel free to reach out anytime. We're here to help! ✨
